sentences.en: A third layer transverse cellulose strands is indicated as the microscope stage is rotated.
sentences.cn: 如将显微镜载物台旋转,便能从纤维横断面中看到第三层胞壁.

sentences.en: A transverse bar joins the two posts.
sentences.cn: 一根横杆连接着两根立柱。

sentences.en: For metallic materials, a transverse interference technique is used.
sentences.cn: 对于金属材料应用一种横向干涉技术.

sentences.en: One of the characteristics of lava and debris valleys is a U - shaped transverse profile.
sentences.cn: 熔岩流及泥石流谷的特点之一是横剖面为U型.

sentences.en: Storm when we transverse is certainly very big.
sentences.cn: 我们横渡时风浪一定很大.

sentences.en: Such waves are called transverse waves.
The main girders support I - section transverse ribs.
sentences.cn: 主梁支承着工字梁的横向肋.

sentences.en: The transverse diaphragm is very similar in appearance to the conventional bar joist.
sentences.cn: 横梁很相似于通常的钢筋搁栅.

sentences.en: The transverse fibres or commissure unite the two ganglia of a pair.
sentences.cn: 横行的纤维即接索则把成对的两个神经节连在一起.

sentences.en: The transverse nerves pass to the spiracles of their segment.
sentences.cn: 横神经通往同体节的气门.

sentences.en: The transverse sensitivity was due primarily to the end loops in the grid pattern.
sentences.cn: 横向灵敏度主要来源于栅端部转弯处.

sentences.en: Transverse bars may migrate down - stream relatively rapidly.
sentences.cn: 横向沙滩可以相当迅速地向下游移动.

sentences.en: Transverse bracing was installed between the two shafts.
sentences.cn: 两根立柱之间设置了横撑.

sentences.en: Transverse forces acting in the positiveco - ordinate direction are positive.
sentences.cn: 横力作用在正坐标方向的为正.

sentences.en: With the X - frames projecting into the boxes, the transverse diaphragms were formed.
sentences.cn: 把这些 X 框架放进这些箱体, 就成了横隔梁.

words.tran_cn: 横向的；横断的；横断线的（等于transverse）
横向；截线或贯线；横行肌

phrases.tran_cn: 横向接缝；横节理；横向接头
横稳性；横向稳定性；横向稳度

trans.tran_cn: 横向的，横断的，横切的，向横活动的
